definition: not to be present/to be out/(euphemism) to pass away/to be deceased
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
to be nothing difficult/to be a cinch
to pay no attention to/not to mind
not in the least concerned (idiom)/reckless/couldn't give a damn about it/unperturbed/couldn't care less/harum scarum

wine-lover's heart is not in the cup (idiom); a drinker not really interested in alcohol/having an ulterior motive/to have other things in mind/with an ax to grind/accomplishing something besides what one set out to do
pinyin: zui4 weng1 zhi1 yi4 bu4 zai4 jiu3

definition: to be dead/to have passed away
don't meddle in affairs that are not part of your position (Confucius)
pinyin: bu4 zai4 qi2 wei4 bu4 mou4 qi2 zheng4

definition: to be out of form/not to be oneself
a book is not judged by its cover (idiom)
pinyin: bao1 zi5 you3 rou4 bu4 zai4 zhe3 shang4

sentences.english: It's not going to happen overnight.
So watch out for these tests because they happen all the time。
sentences.chinese: 所以，要當心這些測試，因爲它們無時不在。

sentences.english: Why should cattle not graze near yew trees?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼牛不在紫杉附近喫草？

sentences.english: But Love does not traffic in a marketplace, nor use a huckster's scales.
sentences.chinese: 但愛不在市場上交易，也不用小販的秤來稱量。

sentences.english: Carlo Ancelotti's side doesn't look to be in top form.
sentences.chinese: 安切落蒂的隊伍看起來不在最佳狀態。

sentences.english: The winner's edge is all in the attitude, not aptitude.
sentences.chinese: 贏者的優勢全在態度，而不在才智。

sentences.english: Hope that the United States will abandon the Cold War mentality, not in Hongkong to engage in political gamesmanship.
sentences.chinese: 希望美方摒棄冷戰思維，不在香港搞政治上的小動作。

sentences.english: Their goal is to serve me a relevant ad everywhere I am.
sentences.chinese: 他們的目標是無處不在的爲我提供相關的廣告。

sentences.english: Zhao Zigeng smiled, and did not care to verbal stimuli "."
sentences.chinese: 趙子庚笑笑，毫不在意並以言語刺激宇文。

sentences.english: That's how schoolyard bullies run playgrounds and global godfathers do it everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 這就是校園欺負運行操場和全球教父做到無處不在。

sentences.english: He little recked what might happen.
sentences.chinese: 他不在乎會發生什麼事。

sentences.english: I'm not in the scene , I think I'm fallin' asleep.
sentences.chinese: 我不在場景中，我認爲我睡着了。

sentences.english: Deciding whether to use Hickory Woodlots or Forests is a debate outside the content of this article.
sentences.chinese: 使用山胡桃植林地或者是樹林不在本文討論之列。

sentences.english: Please leave a message if I won't be there.
When he was not at the firm, Obama was teaching at the University of Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 他不在事務所的時候，就會去芝加哥大學講課。

sentences.english: If you do not care about your love machine , used vegetable oil , such as points, I will not object.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不在乎你的愛機，用點菜油之類的我也不反對。

definition: haven't/hasn't/doesn't exist/to not have/to not be
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
place/location/(after a noun) place where it is located
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
